name: Crop Busters
summary: Turn a barren scrap of dirt into the prettiest patch of soil in the heartland with Crop Busters, an entertaining endeavor from the makers of Farm Frenzy. Scarlett is excited when she returns to her grandmother's farm for the first time since she was a child. Her dreams of a perfect homecoming go awry though when she discovers that the homestead of her youth has lost its luster.
